profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Bug Bounty Hunter & Security Researcher at Mattermost
profile.summary: Highly skilled software engineer with a passion for web application security testing, Python programming, and various security tools and frameworks. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions while staying up-to-date with the latest security trends.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Develop and maintain secure software applications using Python and various security frameworks.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize security vulnerabilities.
Conduct regular security research and stay up-to-date with the latest threat intelligence.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Python, Django, and various security frameworks.
Conducted bug bounty hunting activities for clients to identify vulnerabilities in their software applications.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and contributed to multiple open source projects using Python and various security frameworks.
Collaborated with other developers to identify and fix security vulnerabilities in the codebase.

experience.title: Bug Bounty Hunter
description: Identified and reported security vulnerabilities in software applications using various bug bounty platforms.
Conducted research to stay up-to-date with the latest threat intelligence and security trends.
